title: Self-Sabotage Recovery
description: Stop undermining yourself and step into your full potential

questions.question: Why does self-sabotage often happen?
options: Because a part of us believes sabotage serves a protective purpose

questions.question: What is the most effective approach to self-sabotage?
options: Using more willpower to push through
Understanding and working with the protective part that sabotages
Ignoring it and hoping it goes away
